itunes:title: Doctrine & Covenants 76 : followHIM Favorites
title: Doctrine & Covenants 76 : followHIM Favorites
description:
Four-minute clip of Hank and John's favorite part of this week's Come, Follow Me Study.
Some define the gospel about what you can't do, but Doctrine & Covenants 76:40-41 defines the gospel as "glad tidings" that Jesus Christ can save all. We do not need to be perfect to come unto Christ. The correct order is we first come to Christ and then we can be perfected in Him.

Please leave a review on the podcast.

Join us on social media:
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FollowHimOfficialChannel
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/followhimpodcast
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/followhimpodcast

"Let Zion in Her Beauty Rise" by Marshall McDonald
https://www.marshallmcdonaldmusic.com/products/let-zion-in-her-beauty-rise-piano
